name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】ReGLOSS 1st Live ＂Flashpoint＂【有明アリーナ】 [wlPLYUOmtHE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: MC section where members greet the audience at Ariake Arena.
Instrumental dance break with live band performance.
MC section introducing the next song in the medley.
Performance of the rapid verse section of 'Otonose'.
Short MC shout-out to the audience.

subtitles.original: 飛び乗ってスカイハイフューチャー
subtitles.english: Jump on into the sky-high future

subtitles.original: フライングしたってお構いなしさ　ザ・ライト
subtitles.english: I don't care if I jump the gun, into the light

subtitles.original: ときめいてしまえば
subtitles.english: Once your heart starts racing

subtitles.original: 瞬く間に広がる開放感
subtitles.english: A sense of freedom spreads in the blink of an eye

subtitles.original: 一つつなげてパノラマ
subtitles.english: Connect them one by one into a panorama

subtitles.original: 街中が目覚めてくスタァライト
subtitles.english: The whole town awakens, starlight

subtitles.original: 変わる変わる色のパノラマ
subtitles.english: A panorama of ever-changing colors

subtitles.original: 満ち溢れるフィーリング　アテンション
subtitles.english: Overflowing with feelings, attention

subtitles.original: 始まりのその時が来た
subtitles.english: The moment of the beginning has come

subtitles.original: Nothing is impossible
subtitles.english: Nothing is impossible

subtitles.original: 目指す　惹かれてく世界
subtitles.english: Aiming for a world I'm drawn to

subtitles.original: ここ先はまだ誰も知らない世界
subtitles.english: From here on is a world no one knows yet

subtitles.original: 五感してるだけじゃつまんない
subtitles.english: Just using five senses is boring

subtitles.original: リアルタイムで通じ合って
subtitles.english: Connecting in real time

subtitles.original: 不意に書き換えるモーション
subtitles.english: Suddenly rewriting the motion

subtitles.original: 異常なスピードも I don't mind
subtitles.english: I don't mind even unusual speeds

subtitles.original: 予測できないシチュエーション
subtitles.english: An unpredictable situation

subtitles.original: どこまで行ってみたい
subtitles.english: How far do you want to go?

subtitles.original: センチメンタルはない Get far away
subtitles.english: No sentimentality, get far away

subtitles.original: 共に声を鳴らして
subtitles.english: Let's make our voices ring out together

subtitles.original: 肌を貫くような真っ直ぐな痛みが伴っても
subtitles.english: Even if it's accompanied by a sharp pain that pierces the skin

subtitles.original: この仲間たちと最果てまで Keep running to the end
subtitles.english: With these friends, to the ends of the earth, keep running to the end

subtitles.english: Jump on into the sky-high future

subtitles.original: フライングしたってお構いなしさ　ザ・ライト

subtitles.english: The whole town awakens, starlight

subtitles.english: A panorama of ever-changing colors

subtitles.original: 満ち溢れるフィーリング　アテンション
subtitles.english: Overflowing with feelings, attention

subtitles.original: 飛び出せユアセルフアップ
subtitles.english: Jump out, lift yourself up

subtitles.original: 恐れるものはないスタァライト
subtitles.english: There's nothing to fear, starlight

subtitles.original: 照らし出せ夜明けが
subtitles.english: Let the dawn shine through

subtitles.original: 透明な明日を運んでる
subtitles.english: It's bringing a transparent tomorrow

subtitles.original: Mr. Starlight
subtitles.english: Mr. Starlight

subtitles.original: Mr. Starlight
subtitles.english: Mr. Starlight

subtitles.original: 皆さんこんにちはー！
subtitles.english: Hello everyone!

subtitles.original: こんにちはー！
subtitles.english: Hello!

subtitles.original: ReGLOSS 1st Live "Flashpoint"へようこそお越しくださいました！
subtitles.english: Welcome to ReGLOSS 1st Live "Flashpoint"!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 今日は皆さん楽しんでいって、素敵な一夜にいたしましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's all have fun today and make it a wonderful night!

subtitles.original: 今日は生バンドでお届けいたします！盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Today we're performing with a live band! Let's get fired up!

subtitles.original: みんな、次の曲は『マニック』だよー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, the next song is 'Manic'!

subtitles.original: 盛り上がる準備はいいですかー？
subtitles.english: Are you ready to get excited?

subtitles.original: みんなでウキウキしてね！
subtitles.english: Let's all have a thrill together!

subtitles.original: Okidoki 女才(おのこ)あなどれり
subtitles.english: Okidoki, don't underestimate women's talent

subtitles.original: Easy Breezy 歌い出しはマイフェイバリット
subtitles.english: Easy Breezy, the beginning of the song is my favorite

subtitles.original: Okidoki 自由自在でいたいよね
subtitles.english: Okidoki, I want to be free and easy

subtitles.original: Easy Breezy 踊るわよ Everybody
subtitles.english: Easy Breezy, I'm going to dance, everybody

subtitles.original: だれだれがどうなった？　勝ち誇るも誇るも
subtitles.english: Who became what? Boasting of victory

subtitles.original: 精も出せばモチワラえば　無理げーだって勝つ
subtitles.english: If you put in the effort and laugh, you can win an impossible game

subtitles.original: ときわりない朝から始まる　愉快な仲間
subtitles.english: A cheerful bunch starting from a timeless morning

subtitles.original: ケースケバ・ハイマイサー　無駄話もひと時　バズコースウォッチ
subtitles.english: K-S-K-B High My Sir, idle talk for a moment, buzz course watch

subtitles.original: 運命共鳴　伝染してゆく喜怒哀楽
subtitles.english: Destiny resonance, emotions that become contagious

subtitles.original: 分かち合える場所　共に目指そう
subtitles.english: A place where we can share, let's aim for it together

subtitles.original: Reach the top yeah
subtitles.english: Reach the top yeah

subtitles.original: 絶対絶対絶対絶対的キラチューン
subtitles.english: Absolute, absolute, absolute, absolute killer tune

subtitles.original: 今は自由気まま　ビビるなよユニバース
subtitles.english: Now I'm free and easy, don't be scared, Universe

subtitles.original: リロリロリロリロ進行しろシラフ
subtitles.english: Rilo-rilo-rilo-rilo, progress while sober

subtitles.original: 限界突破　引きつけるミラクル
subtitles.english: Breaking limits, attracting miracles

subtitles.original: みんなー！後ろの方までよく見えてるよー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! I can see you clearly even in the back!

subtitles.original: 次はまだちょっとブンブン振っていけー！
subtitles.english: Next, let's keep waving them like crazy!

subtitles.original: Okidoki 女才(おのこ)あなどれり
subtitles.english: Okidoki, don't underestimate women's talent

subtitles.original: Easy Breezy 歌い出しはマイフェイバリット
subtitles.english: Easy Breezy, the beginning of the song is my favorite

subtitles.original: Okidoki 自由自在でいたいよね
subtitles.english: Okidoki, I want to be free and easy

subtitles.original: Easy Breezy 歌い出しはマイフェイバリット
subtitles.english: Easy Breezy, the beginning of the song is my favorite

subtitles.original: 独り占めだった真夜中に
subtitles.english: In the midnight that I used to have all to myself

subtitles.original: 見つけたんだ　同じ気持ち
subtitles.english: I found it, the same feeling
